SEARCH
Package org.scoverage.plugin

Class SCoverageReportMojo

java.lang.Object
org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
org.scoverage.plugin.SCoverageReportMojo
All Implemented Interfaces:
ContextEnabled, Mojo, MavenReport
Direct Known Subclasses:
SCoverageIntegrationReportMojo, SCoverageReportOnlyMojo
@Mojo(name="report", threadSafe=true) @Execute(lifecycle="scoverage", phase=TEST) public class SCoverageReportMojo extends AbstractMojo implements MavenReport
Generates code coverage by unit tests report in forked scoverage life cycle.

In forked scoverage life cycle project is compiled with SCoverage instrumentation and unit tests are executed before report generation.
Since:
1.0.0
Author:
Grzegorz Slowikowski
